description: Foreign government involvement in national security context

recommendations.critical: If applicable, mention foreign government involvement and link it to national security concerns.
recommendations.rationale: CatBoost analysis shows this is predictive (importance: 3.40) for successful sealing motions when foreign government involvement exists.
recommendations.example: The foreign government interference creates significant national security concerns that justify sealing.
recommendations.insight: Successful motions explicitly link foreign government actions to national security implications.

suggestions: Mention foreign government involvement if applicable
Place in Factual Background or National Security section
